headline: Targa Resources Corp. Announces Quarterly Dividend and Timing of Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Webcast
summary: HOUSTON, Oct. 16, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Targa Resources Corp. (NYSE: TRGP) ("Targa" or the "Company") announced today that its board of directors has declared a quarterly cash dividend of $1.00 per common share, or $4.00 per common share on an annualized basis, for the third quarter of 2025. This cash dividend will be paid November 17, 2025 on all outstanding common shares to holders of record as of the close of business on October 31, 2025.
